tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Experience with pradnya ma'am is like a blessing came our way which being a new wife and first pregnancy was a big surprise as well as a sudden shock because I had history of pcos rupture surgery and all in my past. I had very less confidence over my body regarding efficiency to grow a life inside me...but it all vanished away with her one smile and courageous words that literally gave me breath. She's an outstanding doctor no doubt but more than that fact which I've never seen is she is like a mother sister friend everything u want to see in her she'll be that. Whatever is the situation just by her positive approach towards the same will lighten up anybody's mind from dark clouds it's a big talent of her dt I've seen only and only in her among all doctors I've met until date . such a consistent personality with down to earth behaviour is all her colour.. and she made my pregnancy colourful with the same. It's a true blessing to spend my pre and pregnancy journey with this amazing one man army WOMAN‚ù§Ô∏è she's my blessing as equal as I've got my baby ...yes somewhere it's her efforts more than anyone else that I've gone through everything so smoothly. Doctors are called to be god's angels therefore I have met one.. and that's her ü•∞
reply_text: Hey u have been my fantastic patient... ur such a sweetheart and thank u for ur kind words...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Abortion / Medical Termination of Pregnancy (MTP),Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,Labor and Delivery,Normal Vaginal Delivery (NVD),
review:
*** ******* ** ** ********* ******* **** ***** ** *************** She‚Äôs extremely caring, supportive and kind. Very professional and approachable.

Delivery was at Aditya Care Maternity Home, Bhandup West. This place has the best team of staff. No patient is ever alone for a moment in the labour room. Extremely courteous, helpful staff and five star treatment for their patients. You don't have to run to any other place for scans or blood test. Everything is available and at reasonable cost.

Dr. Pradnya is an expert when it comes to handling complicated issues as my wife had an previous abortion case and this time it was a successful normal delivery. She will go out of her way to ensure that all matters are tactfully handled proactively. Making no room for errors or delay in identifying issues. Have never seen a Doctor who forces for normal delivery inspite of Patient and family wanting C-Section and performs it to best of her ability. You can reach out to her at any hour for complicated matters. Also hospital & Delivery charges I found very reasonable.

We had taken the deluxe room which was clean and neat. Rooms was cleaned thrice a day. AC working properly. Washrooms was clean

Would surely recommend Dr. Pradnya & Aditya Care Maternity Home to each and everyone.
reply_text: Thank you for ur such kind words.. if u trust ur doctor n obey what they say then u get the best results.. it‚Äôs been pleasure to have u as my patient..üòÄ

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
My wife(Saubhagyalaxmi) was admitted in this hospital for maternity. Dr. Pradnya is such a kind and genuine person who always thinks about patient‚Äôs well-being first. She has great expertise in her field. We were always explained about all the possibilities we can opt for. We loved the care provided by the entire staff of the hospital, a very hardworking team. You can call them for need any number of times and they will cater to it promptly. The hospital is small but overall we had a very smooth experience.

Thanks a lot Dr Pradnya and entire team we couldn‚Äôt have expected anything more.

tags: None
review: I came here with fever n some health issues in my 7th month of twin pregnency during diwali wen even my doctor was nt available  4 me (the one wer I went until my 6th month for checkup)....after coming to dr pradnya randive I was given proper treatment 4 fever nd also other problems like less fetal weight ,low hb level etc were also diagnosed. Doctor is very soft spoken....explains everything to u in detail...... so I decided to continue with rest of my pregnency with same doctor...I was given proper treatment wid advise during my each visit .....everything went good till my 9th month of pregnency wen I delivered my healthy twin babies with good health n weight....even the experience with doctor n her team during delivery n post delivery was excellent.....I would highly recommend anyone should visit here once n u ll never b disappointed.....

tags: None
review: As a doctor she may be good as I can only comment after my another visit or if the infection gets cured. She heard me patiently but she doesn't have value for others time. I had an appointment at 7.30pm. she reached the center at 8.30. As I had the appointment booked from parcto that doesn't matter to them, intact prior appointment doest matter to them, they have their manual booking. I had appointment at 7.30 but met her at 9.30pm. I was disappointed by her attitude towards time and by the staff there at Aditya Care.
reply_text: As a matter of fact the delay was due to some  emergency that cropped up at that time.. sorry for the inconvenience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: *** ******* ** *** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** **** Her smiling face and way of explaining things are just awesome. I had visited Dr. Pradnya ma'am for my pregnancy check up. She made my pregnancy journey happy,  smooth and healthy.  Only because of her treatment, I defeated covid-19 when I was just 3 months pregnant without any complications. I had a healthy pregnancy but at the end I had to go for emergency C-section delivery but the way she handled everything was just amazing. She and her staffs have taken very good care of me and my baby during our hospital stay. A big thanks to Dr. Pradnya ma'am for everything. I would recommend everyone to visit her.
reply_text: Thanks u for being  such nice patient for me .

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I had visited Dr.Pradnya for my irregular periods issue before lockdown. She diagnosed the issue and treated me for the same . I was satisfied with the experience and so when I conceived this last year, I decided to visit her for for further treatment. She has been the most friendliest doctor that I have ever met. During each check up she explained what are we checking and why. 
She made my pregnancy feel like a breeze. She also calmed my anxiety everytime I was worried during checkup. She pushed for a normal delivery till the end.  I a very thankful to the doctor for giving us a great pregnancy experience.  I would definitely recommend her to everyone who want to have a smooth pregnancy.
reply_text: You been a lovely patient of mine.. thank  u  dear.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Pradnya and her team are the best for any treatment that you are looking for. I have been to other gynecologist in the past, but only Dr. Pradnya could understand my situation and promptly do the scan, explain to me and my husband the best treatment for us with very possibility that comes. I had a surgery and was admitted for a day. The anaesthetist and OT staff made me very comfortable throughout the procedure. The staff are really friendly and understanding. You are treated equally and the waiting is first come, first basis with no bias except if their's an emergency. Even though it's a small unit, it's very commendable in what they do best for all the patients. I recommend Dr. Pradnya to everyone who is seeking issues in gynecology and obstetrics.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pre-Pregnancy Counselling,Pregnant Women Counseling,Labor and Delivery,
review: I would definitely recommend Dr Pradnya to everyone. The way she interact with every patient is appreciable. Rather than going for senior experienced doctors we were in search of doctor who can give us time and can answer all our questions . On first appointment only we decided to continue with her for pregnancy check up and delivery. We asked lots of silly questions during entire pregnancy. But she explained everything in detailed and gave us a confidence every time. You can always find a big smile on her face on every visit and her friendliness with every patient relieves stress of everyone. Hospital staff is also very good. During my hospitalisation period, loving and caring treatment was given by entire staff. Thank you doctor and entire hospital staff for making this journey happy.
reply_text: Thank you dear.  Patients like you are a blessing who listen to all that doctor says..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Visited doctor for my wife's pregnancy. Very happy with the treatment during the entire course of pregnancy. Doctor explained everything in detail to us and answered all our questions. My wife was detected with gestational diabetes very early in her pregnancy, doctor guided us properly and was in constant touch with us and was always available to answer queries on phone/whatsapp. During the delivery also doctor and hospital staff took very good care of my wife. Will surely recommend Dr. Pradnya to family and friends.
reply_text: Thank youüòä

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have been suffering from hypertension during eihht month of pregnancy. Visited doctor pradnya in the first week of ninth month. She immediately explained the risks involved and also at the same time provided the solution for it by explaining the delivery procedure. For two days tried to make the delivery normal but due to my health issues took an apt decision to take up ceserean for my and babys health. Also there was personal attention and care taken by doctor herself and by every member of the staff. I shall recommend stongly the treatment over here. Wish good luck for dr. Pradnya and her team ahead...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I visited Dr.Pradnya for my wife's pregnancy check up.** *** ******** * ***** *** *** ** *** ** *** ****** *** most friendly doctor I have ever seen.My wife was lucky to have her as a consultant.She make us understand every point in a very simple and friendly way.My wife was always afraid of pain related issue,but Dr Pradnya made her to gain confidence in every aspect.She was always in favour of normal delivery unlike many doctors.By the grace of God and Dr.Pradnya's and her team's effort me and my wife were blessed with a baby boy.Thanks to her and her all staff members including all nurses who were cooperative throughout the stay.With no second thought I would highly recomend Dr Pradnya.Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had recently delivered baby boy at Adityacare - Dr. Pradnya and her team was very professional and cooperative.I had a water breakage issues due to which I needed to admit and treated according but Dr. Pradnya had made all attempts to make it normal.  Dr. Deepali and her other staff members  were very much helpful and made  me comfortable with there gestures. I m highly delighted with there services and also recommend everyone to take advantage of it. Its been said C-section deliveries can be done by any  Doctors around but hardly few professionials emphasis on normal one and Dr.  Pradnya is one of them. Someone truly said Doctors are next version of God who make you comfortable with there friendly behavior but in Adityacare maternity everyone seems to be like that. 
I will take an opportunity to thank you all for supporting me in my crucial time.
reply_text: Thank you dear from our team at Aadityacare üòä

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr Pradnya is a very **** *** friendly doctor. I visited her for my pregnancy check ups. She has always advised me with ***** medicines and time to time check ups. At 5th month I had my internal OS opened which could have lead to miscarriage. But Dr Pradnya did the OS tightening surgery and provided me all guidance for which I could deliver a full time matured healthy baby. One great thing about this doctor is, she gives emphasis to normal delivery then c section. I would highly recommend this doctor. But only improvement areas the nurse and staffs of her clinic. They need to learn more professionalism. Clinical hygiene should be improved. But non the less doctor is highly efficient.
reply_text: Thank u chinmayee .. I will definitely work on ur suggestions..

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: This doctor is highly unprofessional *** ******* ****** **** ** ****** ** **** * ***** *********** During this pandemic, I started consulting her for my pregnancy. The initial treatment was usual and she very nicely pretended to be supportive all the time. However, when we required her guidance the most, *** ****** **** ** ******* A week before my delivery, I was tested positive for corona and she had assured me before the test to not worry about the results and assured her support and consultation post test results whatsoever till delivery in her hospital. However, from the day of my test results, she became unresponsive  and also instructed her team in hospital to give ***** reasons of being sick and not attending any patients for next 3 to 4 days..... *** ** **** ********* ** **** *** ********** ******** **** **** my water bag broke under stress and we faced many problems in getting a hospital at the last minute when I was on the verge of labor. My concern is not that she didn't facilitate me since I was corona positive, but her unresponsiveness over multiple calls and messages that left me with no answers. How could a doctor leave her patient in mid-way ** **** **** ** ********* ***** **** ******** ** ** *** ** ****** She could have atleast shown some courtesy and courage by answering my queries over call if not providing treatment. ***** ***** ** **** **** ***** ** ****** *** ******* ****
reply_text: The only time that I didn‚Äôt work in pandemic was June when I myself was tested positive and was admitted in the hospital...I have served my patients throughout the pandemic otherwise.. if you delivered at that time then yes I was not available otherwise I was very much there for my patients.. I have also delivered corona positive cases in my hospital following all BMC guidelines... when u were tested positive u were taken by Bmc officials to Cama hospital and u delivered there .. u contacted me after delivery and I did tell u what all precautions to be taken... u becoming corona positive n then u were taken by the BMC was absolutely not in my hands and when u went in labor u were in hospital premises where u were in safe hands only... I did what I could do for u but sometimes something fall short which are not in our hands..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had an overwhelming experience with Dr. Pradnya Randive during my delivery.
She is truly a gem of a person. A very friendly personality and truly caring as far as her patients are concerned.
Initially I was sceptical with my pregnancy as I had a hematoma but I delivered a healthy baby under her care.
She always tries for normal delivery.With my previous delivery as a c section,she kept me in labour for a couple of hrs because she wanted to go for normal delivery but she had to do C-section due to complications.
Dr Pradnya is a very efficient ,prompt, always available, friendly , helpful, always lively doc !!
She makes you very comfortable the moment you meet her..Greets all her patients with her Big and contagious smile..
In short..A highly competent doctor and a compassionate human being.. Highly recommended !!
reply_text: Thank you for such kind words.. n definately it's a blessing to get patients like you who trust their doctors n believe themüòä
